text: Tamen yi zhenzhu mengshi, shuo tamen mei shuo shenme, qishi, tamen que yi shuoguo bu xindao dehua, erqie tamen zai biaoshi xinfeng yisilan jiao zhihou, you buxinle, tamen que yi tumoubugui, dan wei decheng. Tamen feinan, zhi yin zhenzhu ji qi shizhe yi qi enhui shi tamen fuzu. Ruguo tamen huiguo, na dui tamen shi geng youyi de; ruguo tamen beiqi, zhenzhu jiu yao zai jinshi he houshi shi tamen zaoshou tongku de xingfa, tamen zai da dishang meiyou renhe baohu zhe, ye meiyou renhe yuanzhu zhe.
